page.title: 18Hemingstone/Coddenham Estate
page.content: Shrubland Park Estate is the home of the de Saumarez family, the present Lord de Saumarez being the 6th Baron. In 1966 the Mansion was converted into a Health Clinic and the family moved into The Vista, a new house built for them on the Estate. Most of the Park is arable land and there is a commercially operated sawmill which processes timber grown on the Estate. The gardens are opened to the public each year in support of charities. Coddenham House, a classic Georgian building was originally the Rectory. It became too large for the incumbents to manage and in 1965 it was sold and is now a private residence. A new Rectory was built in 1974 in the village. Hemingstone Hall, an Elizabethan style mansion, has been extensively landscaped and presents an attractive view from Rectory Road.
